intensity: Start at 70-75% of 1 rep max for compound lifts, progressively increasing to 80-85% over 4-week training block
progression: Increase load by 2.5-5 lbs on primary lifts weekly, focus on linear progression for major compound movements like squats, bench press, and deadlifts
deload: Implement deload week every 4-5 weeks, reducing training volume by 40-50% and intensity to 50-60% of working weights to prevent overtraining and promote recovery
